margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">People are the way they are today due to their upbringing, culture, past experience and financial status.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Chaos is our constant companion in these times of change. Eliminating chaos is tantamount to eliminating life.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">What you cannot comprehend---you cannot predict.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Mentors are meant to open the doors of your mind rather than giving free advice.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The mindless optimist is the fellow who falls from the 80th story of a skyscraper and as he passes the 50th floor cry with self satisfaction\u2014so far so good.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The most fulfilled people are those who have dissolved the boundaries between work , love and play.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">People who say that something cannot be done should not interrupt those who are doing it. Those who are not lighting any candles should not bitch about the dark.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Dream big , for only big dreams have the power to move your spirit.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Your mind is like a muscle \u2013the more you use it, the more powerful it becomes.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Self confidence requires high levels of health and energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">It is not what happens to you but how you respond to what happens to you that determines how you feel.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Life is too short to waste a minute doing a job you don\u2019t like or care about.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Confidence also comes from being prepared to walk away from a bad situation.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Learn from experts. You will not live long enough to figure it all out.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Any idea or thought that you accept as true will be accepted as a command by your subconscious mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The cold and hard north wind made the Vikings.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Forgiveness is a perfectly selfish act. It sets you free from the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Courtesies of a small and trivial character are the ones which strike deepest in the grateful appreciating heart.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The illiterate of the next century will not be those who do not know how to read and write\u2014but those who cannot unlearn and relearn.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Sure formula for failure is to try and please everybody.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If you fear competition what you really fear is your own incompetence.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">When goals are exciting they ignite your passion . Passion unexpressed by your emotional muscles, simply dissipates.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Know the strengths and weaknesses of your team, or you will be forever trying to shove round pegs into square holes and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Man\u2019s mind when stretched by a new idea never goes back to its original dimensions.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Change is our greatest ally. The kind of thinking that brought us where we are will NOT get us where we want to go.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">All great salesmen have one thing in common\u2014enthusiasm for their product.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Some people show greater interest in work than getting paid for work. People who make a difference are always the ones with the concern \u2013 not with the credentials.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Commitment to a higher standard compels you to act.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If the map and the terrain differs , the terrain counts. The map is just a means\u2014like the budget.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Stories produce better change than dry abstractions. Stories convey beliefs and get hardwired into our brain networks\u2014they tap into ways of intuitively understanding the subtle currents that flow through our lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Hurt comes from a feeling of loss, which is mostly illusionary.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">In order to have a true perspective of one\u2019s importance, keep a cat as a pet that will ignore you royally and a dog that will worship you. You will soon learn not to intimidate or get even with your cat or score brownie points.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Moaning is unproductive and it achieves nothing. It make you a magnet for other moaners ( the laws of magnetism fail here ). Cheerful and positive people attract likewise.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The worst use of time is to do extremely well what need not be done at all. Usually this is what people do to make up for their own lack of competence. I remember once taking over from a Master with a KGB mindset who has the most perfect filing system on this planet\u2014it contained 99% information and stuff which could never be used in the future\u2014sheer waste of paper and time.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Reward extraordinary efforts. Do you remember how great it felt when you got an unexpected bonus at work the last time. If you feed a dolphin every time it jumps and start an uninspired pattern\u2014very soon it wont jump unless you feed it first.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">This is how the unionized Calcutta crew of SCI ships got rotten to the core\u2014no OT, no work. The solution is to give rewards spontaneously. The feeling of being uncertain whether you will be rewarded or not excites the nervous system, increasing the intensity of pleasure when rewarded. To learn more\u2014ask a compulsive gambler , who has been gambling away non stop for 12 hours , about this high which addicts. The dolphin thus jumps high because of the exciting possibility of a juicy reward.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Use negative emotions as a call to action. The best time to use a negative emotion is when you begin to feel it. \u2013kill the monster when it is still tiny, before it can go out of proportion. Your brain gives you emotions of fear and anxiety as a call for preparedness for what may occur in the near future.. Cultivate an attitude of positive expectancy about future events. Treat frustration as your friend. Guilt tells you that you have violated your own standard\u2014so don\u2019t wallow in it\u2014do something to prevent you from violating you own high standard.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">A common denominator among successful leaders is that they consistently make superior evaluations and so can anticipate better than others. They can use foresight to place themselves in the best position for scoring, and seize the moment ( even the infamous hand of god !) -- like Maradona.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">To learn about systematization watch a good cook in a popular short order Udipi restaurant in Mumbai at rush lunch hour. Every move he makes is for a definite purpose. All his ingredients are within easy reach. The most used ones are closest to him. He is so familiar with their positions that he need not look when he reaches out for them\u2014just like the car clutch, brake and accelerator. He puts in every ingredient in at the right time so that nothing is under cooked or over cooked, he has so many hot plates running simultaneously.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">A Creative thinker like to see lots of sky and an extensive beautiful view, rather than sit in a stationary locker without windows. The creative process is aided by by walking on open ground\u2014if the eyes can see far , the mind can reach out. On a walk he will let his brain idle\u2014it allows slower brain waves where connection happens. Though the brain is just a small part of the body weight, it consumes a quarter of the fuel that is essential for problem solving. Thinkers must have an informal work climate. Knowing how to communicate to innovators whose style is alien to yours is important.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If you put your ships crew in a trashy environment,they will trash it even further\u2014but if you put them in a beautiful environment with uplifting images which fires their imagination they will preserve it and feel more at ease with themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">To cultivate your inner garden spend more time with positive uplifting people with wit and interesting perceptions. There is beauty in thinking for ourselves and not accepting someone else\u2019s mediocre standards.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If you are tackling a topic that requires a fresh study, best is to drown yourself in it for an hour without consciously force searching for solutions. Blue thinking means suspending your judgement which tend to be clouded by past and limiting experiences.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">A good leader will even retrain his parents ,who cannot relinquish their old dominance, to communicate with him on an adult to adult basis , and avoid being manipulated by guilt traps.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">A soft answer turneth away wrath. Let not the sun go down on your own wrath.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Geniuses do not wait for an idea to interrupt them\u2014they actively seek them out. They can adapt themselves to anything by making the right demands upon themselves incrementally.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">When people do the extra mile beyond the call of duty praise is due on the spot\u2014not one week later. Failure to give praise may cause them to stop doing this.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The number one demotivator in the world of work is not knowing what is expected\u2014where to put the fulcrum on the quality /quantity lever.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Eliminate worry by identifying the worst possible outcome of every situation. This means risk assessment forms we use are are stress busters. Analyse each situation by asking what is the worst case scenario that could happen and then use the T4 principle to eliminate it<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">SOME DO\u2019S<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">You must have your principles and there must be a line beyond which you will not go.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Let no member of your team come to you without leaving better and happier.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers. Learn ability is the ability to extract generic inferences from specific instances and using them in new unstructured situations.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Sometimes you cannot control the events in your life but you can always control your response to them. Do not expend energy on an approach that is useless\u2014flexibility gives you the power to create a new approach\u2014 if this is construed as shifting goal posts in the middle of a match \u2013so be it. Flexibility is an attitude. If there is one sure thing to guarantee success\u2014it is the ability to change your approach<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Use judgement and discretion\u2014there are times when the exact truth and truth finding exercises are unnecessary.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">When there is a problem go out and act\u2014do just sit there too frightened to move \u2013do something.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">New ideas come from differences, from having different perspectives and juxtaposing different theories. Allow yourself to be unsane , untrapped in your every day sense of sanity to experience things you have unconsciously kept yourself away from.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Professional growth is an extraordinarily high need. Support and give some political cushioning when warranted. Provide flexible working hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Provide your team with the necessary equipment -- get them the best broadband or the latest Windows Vista.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">At meetings , a period of social interaction before getting down to business can encourage a relaxed atmosphere and establish team spirit. You can show that you are interested in somebody as a person , not just as a co worker or boss.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">At meetings look for areas where different views dove tail and can reach an amicable solution. When the going gets tough avoid staring\u2014keep your gaze withing the imaginary triangle produced by the brows and nose.\u2014and make your body language work for you. Where the message is important increase direct eye contact. Look for grimace body language signs which indicate that you have waxed lyrical for too long.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Motivate your team to go that extra distance. Work on your ability to take the complex and make it simple. Maximize limited resources. ( does it sound a little like our own infamous \u201c we maximize your earning potential \u201c which the shipchandlers and workshops followed to the T --tee hee!!) .<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Seize the moment . Know what to do well in advance. Avoid the tendency to snatch back previously delegated work. Shifting priorities, new deadlines and conflicting signals may tempt leaders to snatch back.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Keep abreast with technical developments and be willing to commit. Make quick decisions.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Focus your attention on the immediate needs of your crew. Personally sacrifice for the common good in times of extreme crisis.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Convey the behavior and levels of performance that will be considered unacceptable, acceptable or exemplary within the team..<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Rely on intuition and judgement in dealing with attitudes, biases, perceptions, emotions and feelings. Don\u2019t set arbitrary policies without consulting those directly involved. Stretch your comfort zone to initiate conversations with crew and get commitment at the end of the conversation. Side stepping issues will lead to mistrust and lower your credibility.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Set performance standards that challenge. Give some constructive criticism.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Build a sense of family and make key people know that regardless of what happens you will remain a united family. A culture is designed to support the company\u2019s most valuable resource\u2014its competent and committed employees. He knows the importance of keeping the wolves off the backs of his team.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Sometimes step aside as a leader so as not to slow everyone else down. Give authority to people to whom you have given responsibility.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Regularly check how everybody is doing emotionally, psychologically and physically.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Take steps to ensure that the team is proud of how they are developing.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Set a pace to allow everybody to keep up. Make sure the work load is balanced for everyone.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Roll up your sleeves and pitch in during times of crisis. Say\u2014your 3 month stock of ship\u2019s provisions are all lying on deck and suddenly there is a huge downpour.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Understand the capabilities of your group. Empower people to take action. Treat all with fairness and dignity.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Let people know that you are open to suggestions and recommendations.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">At the end of the day review today\u2019s actions and plan for tomorrow.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Respect is gained by personal courage displayed during difficult times and in the face of potential strong opposition. Be spontaneous without fear of being nervous. Be dominant\u2014not domineering. Be strong when your team is under stress.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Take time off to think.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Be constantly aware of learning opportunities. Never be afraid to ask questions if you does not know the answers. Take responsibility for your own learning curve.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Detect and check deviations from standard operating procedures to see if they are for the better<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Be a good diagnostician and value a spirit of inquiry. Preoccupation with small technical problems and getting bogged down with tiny meaningless details is undesirable.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">In any workplace there will be a mountain of red tape, bureaucracy, old rules left by the previous management regimes\u2014get rid of them. I usually start off high profile by changing the meal timings\u2014to show that the old order will change for the better.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">It is easy to give someone a contract and a job description in the company manual. Trouble is it leads to a lot of confused people. Let everybody know right from the start, what is expected of them. Or you get people doing the wrong things , and them telling you this is the way we did at the last place we worked.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Adapt your style depending on the team member\u2014there is no need to change your spots or personality. I was once stuck with a stone deaf chief officer\u2014after 5 months I realised that I had indeed changed my personality\u2014speaking loud and shrill was never my style. Think about what they need and what motivated them\u2014and adapt your management style too accordingly.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Every body in a team , no matter how lowly their position or rank has something to offer. These are the ones at the cutting edge. Get their feedback and their ideas. You might listen \u2013that does not mean that you are going to act on every one of their ideas.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">In a team some have to be slowed down and others speeded up. Some will be good in technology while others will be not. It is this difference which makes a team superb. \u2014vive la difference.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Meetings can be used to fuse a team. The leader must be firmly in control\u2014there can be no wishy washy democracies. Start meetings on time. Never go back over stuff for late comers. Make meetings fun. Be flexible and allow people to be themselves so that they contribute. The stuffy manager is frightened because he feels insecure and seeks a rigid approach to prop up his lack of self confidence. Managers who are secure in themselves do not need to score points or bully or interfere. Steering a steady course needs small helm movements not continuous hard a port hard a stbd movements\u2014just to prove that you have the all important con.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If any of your team wants to talk to you just because he is lonely and you seem to have a fun image \u2014don\u2019t get uptight as long as he is not taking advantage of this and you do not lose control<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">You will sleep well if you have a clean conscience. You have never stitched up anybody or broken any laws. Your salary is not your driving force\u2014your driving force is your need to be the finest living legend at sea.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">In any conversation the person who asks the questions has the control. Use questions to control a meeting.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">De Hiring is a key part of leadership. The general who keeps a core-coward in his force is himself incompetent. The right attitude here means going that extra mile, to brainwash and recover this poor soul even when you are pissed off.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Respect is the key determinant of high performance leadership. How much people respect you determines how well they perform. Integrity is the most respected quality of leadership. Always keep your word.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Make every goal clear specific , measurable and time bounded. Goals that are not in writing are just wishes or fantasies.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Some DON\u2019T\u2019S<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">As a leader you must not be disruptive unless it is in an innovative way.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Don\u2019t depend upon the predictions of others\u2014make your own.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Don\u2019t believe all these so called aptitude tests made by mediocre men\u2014the kinds which will declare that the Eskimo cannot adapt themselves to extreme Arctic colds.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Blindness or fear of the new , causes leaders who are heavily invested in yesterdays ideas, to miss the boat.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Don\u2019t set the bar at an impossible high level . It ensures lack of fulfillment and self worth.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Do not associate with those who are chronic complainers and conduct formal organizational cynic clinics. Model and support positive behavior. Exhibits the confidence and drive to inspire others.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Spend time building people up instead of tearing them down. Do not motivate people by fear. Consistently be open and honest even when it hurts. Share your fears.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Do not ill treat the bearer of bad news or shoot the messenger.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Do not use fear as the key. It causes some to lose focus on the new direction and possibly dragging others down with them as in the example of a drowning swimmer. Do not give untimely criticism.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Don\u2019t let time bandits come to your desk and steal a major portion of your prime time. Work is not composing emails or pushing your mouse. It is about doing something and being productive and profitable.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Don\u2019t expect people to abide by your corny rules if you do not clearly state what they are. The fewer rules you have \u2013the more happier you will be. When I go home on leave I lock up all my rules in my suitcase, and keep it under the bed \u2013to be reopened only when setting off from home to join ship. Could this be the reason why a super strong personality like yours truly did not have a single fight with his wife for a quarter century of married life.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Never allow yourself to be scapegoated by companies who conveniently lose their Jekyl to gain some Hyde. If they want a sucker let them find a less honourable man who does not have the moral fibre-- if you build a reputation of honour , integrity and honesty, no rogue will ever approach you to cover up or cover up for their fraudulent acts to make a few dollars more. It gets easier once you have established a reputation for not covering up. Remember\u2014a real friend will never ask you to cover up for him and put yourself into danger of disgrace.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Make yourself the default setting for the honesty factor, the standard by which others judge themselves. If you get sacked for caring for your own honour\u2014so be it. Hindsight says that 75% of all sackings are not because somebody did not do his job\u2014but because he did not fit into the rotten corporate culture. In such petty , small minded cultures you may be a senior manager \u2013but to get a pencil from the stationary cupboard you have to speak nicely to the custodian of the stationary cupboard.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">For creative juices to flow , there are eureka environments, where the matrices of disciplined thought are are already operating but not yet sufficiently hardened to disrupt the dream like fluidity of imagination. Eureka moments in the early morning shower\u2014at the border line between sleep and full awakening .<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Eureka moments require the right and left hemispheres of the brain to work together. Neurophysiologists might propose the RH side of the brain\u2014humanistic psychologists offer the subconscious mind---mystics will identify the great cosmic abyss . Good ideas need time to incubate , mature and grow.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Stress is usually associated with the less pleasant aspects of life. --Noise, dirt, extreme temperatures , too tired , too depressed , chest congestion, seasickness, bad smell induced nausea like on Sichem Pearl , loss of sleep/ appetite , inability to enjoy things one is used to, difficulty concentrating, change of sleep patterns etc. Stress is the individuals perception and assessment of the environment. One area which may be stressful for one need not be so for another. Coping up with a difficult senior or junior can be stressful. Not being relieved in time can be stressful. Lively and fun parties give welcome relief from stress.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Like road rage , on my last ship Siteam explorer I discovered there is something equivalent called computer rage. A slow computer or email system which hangs at inopportune times can be stressful, --as it is beyond your control.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Choose the right words\u2014 your voice tone, intonation, volume , facial expression , gesture , body language all play a part in the message you send. Unless all these parts of the equation match , the message remains garbled. There is no need to give lengthy explanations. Take ownership of your message by using the word I,&nbsp; not WE.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Actions of course speak louder than words. Adrenaline produces energy\u2014it has to be expended. Use force appropriate to the situation. Never fuel anger by adding your own two pennies worth. Do not invade another\u2019s personal space unless it is imperative for common good.. While remembering the other persons rights never neglect your own. Never be anybody\u2019s punching bag. Influence without manipulating. There is a difference between a positive constructive feedback and destructive verbal attack. Giving criticism can be as stressful as receiving it.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Avoid using the threatening word \u201cconsequence\u201d. Give negative feedback early\u2014so that the receiver need not dredge his memory. Allow the other person to respond\u2014and give him thinking time. Don\u2019t stray from the subject when giving negative feedback\u2014lest you dilute it. End on a positive note .<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">An assertive leader have a positive self image. Spontaneous assertive self expression is important in all instances if you have to avoid the adrenaline rush induced F and F responses of seething , over reacting, withdrawal or sulking.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">You cant motivate people with logic. If you want to move them you must touch their emotions. 5 emotions are love, pride, greed, guilt and fear.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The ability to focus attention on important things is a measure of intelligence.&nbsp;&nbsp;Incorrect assumptions lie at the root of every failure. Delegate responsibility only to those who have demonstrated an ability to handle it. A person who suffers a incompetent employee is himself incompetent. Speed is an important quality of leadership. Authority without love is stifling.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 11pt;\">Stupid is forever, ignorance can be fixed.<b>&nbsp;- Don Wood</b>.</span></i><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TO_pLez__0I/AAAAAAAAA0E/e220DlE-A8o/s1600/imagesCAWPBNJA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 11pt; text-decoration: none;\"><img alt=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TO_pLez__0I/AAAAAAAAA0E/e220DlE-A8o/s1600/imagesCAWPBNJA.jpg\" border=\"0\" height=\"225\" src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\ajit\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image001.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_3\" width=\"225\" /></span></a><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">TEAMWORK<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">A team takes on a life of its own and you have to regularly nurture and maintain it.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Each member of the team is entitled to be interested in all aspects of the operation. This is not cancelled out by the fact that he has special responsibilities in a limited area, like the goal keeper in a soccer team. This creates higher levels of job satisfaction and commitment plus higher levels of trust and support.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Teamwork is the ability to work towards a common vision. Its is the forum for the common man to attain uncommon results. Teams provide possibilities for empowerment that are not available to individual employees. Teams can implement complex plans and develop creative solutions to complex problems much better than individuals.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">A group in itself does not necessarily constitute a team. A team is a small group of people with complementary and diversified skills committed to a common purpose, where they use their strengths in full and can complement for each others weakness..<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">In order to be a good team player one has to compromise.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Never constrain a team member to guess at something when you are ashore or absent for some time\u2014this is not good teamwork. Hostility among team members , missed signals, misunderstood decisions and low participation are symptoms that signal a need for team building. Morale problems do not happen overnight and they cannot be resolved overnight. Conflict resolution is not a stand alone skill. Without this skill the team cannot bond. The team must perform as if they owned the company themselves. The team members must know what is expected of them.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Building effective team spirit requires leaders to be excited and even passionate about what they do on a daily basis. It is the leaders job to provide a positive and congenial climate .<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Give your team members more control over their jobs.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">A good team has flexibility and synergy and achieves more than the sum of its parts. It is the job of the leader to identify issues that inhibit the team from reaching their goals address those issues and remove the inhibitors.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The team leader must have people skills. Team members must know how to examine team and individual errors and weaknesses without making personal attacks. The leader must be able to identify jealousy, cynicism and defensive behavior. He must build a feeling of solidarity and team spirit. He has to look out for the cynical lone ranger who ignores others, and survives by being servile to the immediate boss who writes his service report. Don\u2019t excuse a badly behaving team member. In a meeting if conflict gets terribly overheated\u2014take a break and let every one cool off.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Have you noticed how a good football manager like Alex Ferguson sits in the stands , furiously chewing gum , watching team dynamics\u2014the natural forces at play and determine is they are acting for good. He will make interventions to make the effect of those dynamics more positive. Coaching will be provided to make up any skill deficiencies. He quickly determines the teams strength and weaknesses and tailors new approaches. He provides feedback to correct unproductive moves. A good basketball coach calls time out at key moments of the game to give team members an opportunity to assess their play against the game plan and as necessary refocus their thinking and energy for the next critical period of time<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Some people are just negative by nature. Don\u2019t hesitate to confront such cynical team destroyers and demand behavior change at once. Some people lack confidence and view attacks on their opinions as a personal attack. A typical statement would be \u201care you telling that my 20 years of experience does not matter?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Team building cannot be a short term flavour of the months \u2013like how the PSC gives statements like \u2013this month we will concentrate on GMDSS and next month on crew accommodation hygiene.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Music orchestra bands are a clear example of how a team works. Poor performing bands are inflexible, the musicians have petty differences, compete with each other, stay in their comfort zones and expect the audience to accommodate their jarring music.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Just plain old Harmony is not the goal of cross functional teamwork . False consensus is undesirable where team members are afraid to express a contrary point of view for fear it will destroy the positive feelings among team members. An absence of overt conflict is often mistaken for teamwork. Conflict is natural and desirable. Issues are attacked \u2013not each other. If conflict is not visible , either the people are thinking alike or they have suppressed conflict. Both situations are not helpful. Teams that suppress conflict lose effectiveness and the conflict erupts into destructive ways. A good leader will not allow endless debates on minor problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Team leaders must be fair, supportive and recognised by team members as one who can make final judgements and work with the upper management .<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The blue ocean leader is not afraid of taking the first step--as he is sure of his own capabilities..He knows the importance of understanding another point of view. He knows that progress has been made on this planet only through disobedience and rebellion-- and that people with spirit , passion and courage have always been sinister to the walking dead. &nbsp;Strength of character and courage of convictions is NEVER mistaken for poor attitude. He communicates in the language of the people NOT in fuckin' latin. He revels in awakening creating joy in creative expression. He is NOT stupid to mistake motion for effective action. He knows that force can conquer and win battles, but its victories are always short lived. He knows that a drive for consensus is always the first refuge of the scoundrels. You dont convert men by silencing them. he knows when he praises everybody he praises nobody.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The leader must give team members a large picture of how the overall project is going\u2014 like how I insist on the common folder of the LAN computer to have a running bar diagram for loading , discharging and tank cleaning . Well functioning teams are involved in the setting of objectives with realistic time frames. Roles are clearly defined and do not overlap. Emphasis must be on solving problems and system corrections \u2013not blaming the individual responsible for the problem. There must be frequent performance related feed backs.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Conflict must be openly discussed so as to result in growth or learning. Members must enjoy and respect each other . Most people hesitate to let down a friend\u2014psssst!--one of the reasons why I hold wild, hair down parties to see how my crew polarizes.. In a shore office like EMS Spore I could see the way people polarised by checking out who got let out of whose social invite or office email humor. I remember I once started a chain of email humor just to check this out.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If the goals are foggy or too easy to achieve, the team will not be motivated to make the extra effort that separates a high performance team from an ineffective motley bunch. Goals provide a sense of direction to the team and should not be impossible to achieve. They also must be measurable so that the progress can be monitored.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">When there is no synergy in the team, the people are passive. Their skills and knowledge are not utilized and they waste their time. Any team must have just enough hands to do the job and no more.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If bonuses and incentives are part of the reward system, they should be given to teams performance\u2014not individual performance. Team culture is destroyed by racism, inappropriate race based pay systems , divide and rule overtime policies, horrid working conditions and destructive comments from management. A team cannot achieve its full potential if all that is allowed is logic or information. Any team must focus on real work. When the team realizes that all you are allowing them is to re-arrange the deck chairs on a passenger ship or chip away rust from deck plates or keep a mere lookout, rather than helping to run the ship\u2014they lose interest.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Workplace teams are a means NOT an end. Teams are a means to do something better, quicker, safer and cheaper. A cookbook approach cannot be taken to build teams. Team members often tend to want to clone themselves and invite participants \u201cjust like me\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Be sensitive to friction. Nip it in the bud before it ends in a full scale war with everybody taking sides. Let it be known that feuding wont be tolerated. Reason with them. Don\u2019t take sides\u2014but take swift and resolute action. People must be polite, friendly and kind in a workplace. People are entitled to respect, civilised behaviour and dignity. Creating a good atmosphere is easy when it comes from top down.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If you take sides then you are part of the argument and the disagreement. You as a leader have to remain totally objective and in the middle. Being conciliatory is like mother hen breaking up a fight between 2 of her chicks.. You just want to restore peace. You will not spend inordinate time in finding out who pecked whose ass first.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Your rules say that there can be no bullying, shouting, threatening , intimidation or victimisation in your team. This is abuse. You are allowed to refuse abuse . If somebody is not doing his job he should be taken aside and his mistakes pointed out calmly and rationally. There are the proverbial little chick-licks on whose head an acorn fell and she thought that the sky fell down\u2014and she set off hoppety hop to tell the king\u2014whipping up mass hysteria along the way.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If the team comes to work looking to enjoy themselves, be stretched and challenged then you can get the best out of them. It is the job of the leader to get them emotionally involved , instill pride and make them care about what they do.---that what they do makes a difference, rather than just line the owners pockets. Getting your team to soar takes passion and determination. No one can whistle a symphony\u2014it takes an orchestra to play it. Be ready to prune dead wood, straggly growth and tone deaf lousy flute players.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">The force of a team like a typhoon takes time to grow\u2014but once it is spinning, it is a formidable thing indeed.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">ENDING WITH HUMOUR<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Laugh at yourself before others can laugh at you, then if they laugh at all, they will laugh with you.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Humor is a language which we can use to creatively retrieve a lost position and it is often more effective than pedestrian logic and self justification. Insight can be gained through humour\u2014to hit the mark in a way rational arguments don\u2019t achieve. Humor leaves a gap for you to fill in with your own interpretation. In the world of humor and creativity there is no such thing as nonsense\u2014at least not in the generating ideas stage. When you want to make an imaginative leap\u2014nonsense is exactly what you want. In a meeting where every nods their heads and say \u201cyeah \u2013makes sense\u201d\u2014remember there are probably a thousand people doing it already. Most great innovations are initially regarded as weird, because that is not part of thinking as usual.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">A violin virtuoso believed he could play the violin so well that he could charm all the savage wild beasts. He played for couple of weeks unharmed in the deep Indian forests . One day he was eaten up by a starving tiger. All the other animals approached the tiger and cried \u201cwhy did you do that\u2014he was playing such divine music \u201c. The tiger just cupped his ears and countered \u201cwhat?\u201d. Beware \u2013there are many such deaf people in this world\u2014and there are also the types who pretend to be deaf. Or they will pretend to sleep and expect you to wake them up. You can be a genius , and the most valuable asset of your company --- there are many who are not bright enough to acknowledge you ----or out of jealousy will deliberately not acknowledge you.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">There was this rude boss with the logo \u201cdo it now\u201d poster in his cabin. Sure enough, soon \u2013his deputy ran away with his wife , his accountant ran away with all his money and his trusted secretary informed the police about how he embezzled and siphoned off company funds.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Playfulness or humor allows you to adopt a wider angle lens on the problem, to see old in new ways. Humor is a trigger to free up the mind so that your thinking gets less stuck. You are creating a new chemistry in your brain, walking on roads less travelled.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Humor relaxed the narrowly focused mind to allow intuition to come in the fore front. It is not a problem solving technique, but a different state of emotion. Humor comes from the right side lobe of your brain where intuition also lies.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Contextual humour-- At the exit of a grave yard, engraved on a tombstone \u2014\u201c I told you I was ill \u201c\u2014 never failed to make the saddest person smile.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Signature logos\u2019 for agent provocateur<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Efficiency consultant<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Sow a thought today<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Skill powered confidence<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Where team culture rules<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">If you are not having a good time you aint doin\u2019 it right<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Seize the moment<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Blaze that trail<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Make the most of now<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Where thinking triumphs<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Fire your creative imagination<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Mind musician<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Stereotype mould buster<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Awaken your enthusiasm<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Where terrain prevails over maps.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Elegant solutions always<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Say YES to NOW<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Vision with venture<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">Commitment with conviction<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRWD6Kif9AI/AAAAAAAACW0/IRhOQMzyBxQ/s1600/dark.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRWD6Kif9AI/AAAAAAAACW0/IRhOQMzyBxQ/s1600/dark.JPG\" /></a></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ( 28 years in command )-- NOT 9 to 5 --but 24 hrs a day.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\"><br />\n</div>", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "1", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8861523870453003898/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "4093149015301266758", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2010-12-25T08:25:00+05:30", "updated": "2010-12-25T08:48:43+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMjkzMjQ3MTIzMjgyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/colour-on-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4093149015301266758", "title": "COLOUR ON CHEMICAL TANKERS --  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Colour is an indicator of the purity of the&nbsp; cargo. Any deviation from the known color of a cargo indicates contamination.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">When water ingresses certain chemicals it is easy to find out by visual means ( milkiness&nbsp; , without any elaborate tests. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Majority of the chemicals are clear, and a haze of milky color should be investigated.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Testing of color should be always be done on a white background.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Discoloration of methanol wash during WWT , means that the tank requires further cleaning.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">APHA</span></b><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"> ( hazen ) used for light products such as aromatics and Ketones.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Colour&nbsp; 5 Apha&nbsp;&nbsp; (or Saybolt ASTM D12095)&nbsp; &nbsp;is required for the MEG fg wash&nbsp; ( highest spec.) . Methanol requires only 15 Apha.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Apha solution is platinum chloride solution. The number of cc Apha solution ( min is 5 cc ) for Apha 5 added to distilled water gives the APHA colour shade number.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Apha zero means clear. In your wall wash lab you must have comparator nessler tube ready made solutions of A5&nbsp; A10&nbsp; and A20 ( always in multiples of 5 ).<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%; tab-stops: -1.0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The standard apha solutions are stable for many days but should be done again after one week. The stock solution is stable for an indefinite period if kept in a refrigerator.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%; tab-stops: -1.0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Proforma: ml of 500 APHA Stock Solution Diluted to 100 ml with Distilled Water/ APHA number<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">1/5<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">2/10<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">3/15<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">4/20<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">SAYBOLT</span></b><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"> scale is NOT used by shipstaff. Lightest is +30 Saybolt and darkest is -16 used only in the petroleum industry.&nbsp;&nbsp; Water White standard colour is in the range of&nbsp; +30 to +20.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 17px;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 17px;\">Gasolenes contain dyes&nbsp; will turn a methanol wall wash to a pinkish color. It is very important that the dye is removed prior to loading subsequent cargoes, since with time the dye is harder to remove. The dye can be removed by recirculating an oxidizer solution or bleach.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></u></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 17px;\"></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Acid Wash Colour&nbsp;</span></u></span></div><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Done to test the cleanliness of a tank by wiping one M2 of tank bulkhead with a cotton swab dipped in Toluene. The liquid is then wrung out and tested,as&nbsp; below. Done by ship staff.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">This method is used for analysing aromatic hydrocarbons, like toluene and xylene or to check is petroleum HC are present in aromatic HC. Aromatics are unaffected by Sulphuric acid , but oils and other contaminants are affected. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">A certain amount of sample (21 ml) is mixed in a specified glass cylinder with 7 ml sulphuric acid. The acid will remove impurities present in the sample and will discolour. The colour of the acid-layer, at the bottom of the tube &nbsp;is compared with standard colours in the range of 0 ( water color ) till 14( dark yellow color ).
