The higher the colour number, the worse the sample.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></u></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">ASTM or NPA colour&nbsp;</span></u></span></div><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 17px;\">This method is used to analyse lubricating oils, diesel fuels, etc. The oil is compared in a colorimeter with standard glasses, marked 0, 0.5, 1, 1.5, etc. to 8.&nbsp; There is a relationship between NPA and ASTM 1500.&nbsp; However, below colour 3.5 NPA glasses are darker than ASTM glasses, while above colour 3.5 ASTM is darker than NPA.</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">ASTM D 1500</span></b><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">, previously called NPA defines colour scale and an apparatus suitable for field work and application on board. A test sample is compared with coloured glasses in a revolving magazine. The scale goes from I (water) to 8 (extra dark red). The name \"NPA grade\u2026..\u201d is still often used in shipping when a prospected cargo is circulated or when a vessel's cleanliness is described. A cargo may be accepted at NPA 2, with discharge permitted at NPA 2.5. A certain amount of degradation in such a case can be permitted. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">With a colorimeter on board one can take samples and by experience get an idea of how much of the previous cargo residues can be left unattended without risk for cargo claims (refers to petroleum cargoes rather than to chemical products). The colour of a product is used as a measure for the quality of that product. The following systems are used.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></u></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">FAC colour</span></u></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The FAC colour will be mainly analysed in animal fats. The molten fat is compared with standard colours numbered 1, 3, 5, 7 etc.</span><br />\n<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">GARDNER SCALE AND LOVIBOND SCALE</span></b><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"> ARE USED FOR VEGETABLE OILS.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></u></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Lovibond colour</span></u></span></div><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 17px;\">Generally, this method is used for analysing animal and vegetable oils and fats. The colour is determined with a Lovibond Tintometer.&nbsp; In this apparatus, red, yellow and blue coloured standard glasses are matched which glasses can be slided one after each other. The sample is poured into a glass cell of a specified length, viz. 1/4, 1/2, 1, 2 or 5 1/4''.&nbsp; The colour of the oil is compared with the standard glasses by sliding these glasses in such way that the mixture of the three colours matches the colour of the oil.</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Example:&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The glasses no 20 yellow, no 4 red and no 0.1 blue together give the same colour as the oil sample in an 1\" cell. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The colour is noted as : <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Colour in Lovibond 1'' cell : 20 yellow, 4 red, 0.1 blue.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></u></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Gardner colour</span></u></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The Gardner-scale uses sealed reference tubes for comparison with samples in a tube of the same diameter. (The FAC-method resembles the Gardner method but has a different graduation). The Gardner scale goes from 1 - 18 and is defined in ASTM 1544-63T. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">This colour will be mostly determined in animal and vegetable oils and fats. The colour of the sample is compared with standard Colours in the range 1 - 18.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></u></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Saybolt colour</span></u></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">This colour determination is used to measure the colour of refined petroleurn products, like aviation gasoline, jet fuels and naphthas. In a colorimeter the height of a column of sample matching standard glasses is read.&nbsp; From a table the colour Saybolt is found. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The Saybolt colour scale uses coloured classes against which the sample is compared in a defined apparatus. The colour scale goes from plus 3 )0 (lightest) to minus 16 (darkest). The Saybolt scale is widely used in the petroleum industry The method is defined in ASTM D 156-64. The Saybolt method requires a special apparatus, is somewhat complicated and not particularly suited for use on board ships.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">APHA-colour&nbsp;</span></u></span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></u></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Apha solution is platinum chloride solution. The number of cc Apha solution ( min is 5 cc )for &nbsp;&nbsp;Apha 5 added to distilled water gives the shade number.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Lightest is +30 Saybolt and darkest is -16 used only in the petroleum industry.&nbsp;&nbsp; Water White &nbsp;standard colour is in the range of&nbsp; +30 to +20.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Apha zero means clear. In your wall wash lab you must have comparator nessler tube ready made solutions of A5&nbsp; A10&nbsp; and A20 ( always in multiples of 5 ).<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%; tab-stops: -1.0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The standard apha solutions are stable for many days but should be done again after one week. The stock solution is stable for an indefinite period if kept in a refrigerator.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Proforma: ml of 500 APHA Stock Solution Diluted to 100 ml with Distilled Water/ APHA number<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">1/5<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">2/10<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">3/15<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent2\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">4/20<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">A method called APHA (Hazen) is often used for very light products, defined in ASTM D1209, viz aromatics, ketones <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">This colour is analysed in water white chemicals and solvents, like methanol, VAM, glycols, etc.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">This colour scale is defined with an origin in 100 cc distilled water (value 0) to successively higher values (max 500) by adding APHA-solution (a platinum-cobolt salt solution). The number of cc APHA-solution (min 5 cc) added to the distilled water gives the APHA-colour shade number. A comparison is made against a white background with a product sample in one test tube and a matching APHA-solution in another100 ml of a sample in a specified glass cylinder is compared with a standard colour solution in water.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">1 ml of the standard colour in 99 ml water has a colour APHA of 5; 2 ml standard in 98 rnl water gives colour 10, etc. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">This method can easily be carried out on board. APHA-solutions are best bought from a laboratory, already premixed for a number of shades.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></u></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-size: 19px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 21px;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Standard Test Method for Colour of Clear Liquids - APHA Colour ( pt-co)</span></u></span></div><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">(PLATINUM \u2013 COBALT SCALE) <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">ASTM \u2013 D1209 <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">This test method describes a procedure for the visual measurement of the color of essentially light coloured liquids. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">1. From the stocks solution prepare standards in accordance with Table I by diluting the required volumes to 100 ml with distilled water in the Nessler tube. Cap the tubes and seal the caps with shellac or a water proof cement if long term storage is desired (Note: This standard would be stable for at least at year). <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">2. Wall wash the tank using the appropriate solvent (e.g. Acetone or Methanol or Para-xylene etc as applicable) and introduce 100 ml of the sample into a Nessler tube (Use a filter if the sample has it has any visible turbidity.) <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">3. Report as the color the number of the standard that most nearly matches the specimen.&nbsp; In the event that the color lies midway between two standard, report the darker of the two or otherwise report the range over which an apparent match is obtained. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">TABLE 1 <o:p></o:p></span></div><table border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"MsoNormalTable\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: 36.45pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;\"><tbody>\n<tr style=\"height: 14.95pt; mso-yfti-firstrow: yes; mso-yfti-irow: 0;\">   <td style=\"height: 14.95pt; padding: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;\" valign=\"top\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">As a very general rule, if the wall wash sample is coloured, the colour will usually be caused by an unsaturated dye material and if there is significant colour in the sample, then it is quite usual that the PTT test will also fail. <o:p></o:p></span></div><h4 style=\"line-height: 115%; mso-layout-grid-align: none; mso-pagination: none; page-break-after: auto; text-autospace: none;\"><u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Platinum Cobalt Colour&nbsp; </span></u><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></h4><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 17px;\">Ref. ASTM D 1209 - Typically Colour should be &lt; 15 APHA</span></div><div class=\"Default\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 17px;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Common sense tells us that any previous cargo(s) that were not water-white will potentially result in the wall wash becoming discoloured. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Inorganic zinc coatings that tend to adsorb contamination onto the coating surface are most likely to show the worst effects of discolouration. This is why it is quite useful to have a source of colour remover on board a vessel with zinc coated tanks, because even the slightest colour in the previous cargo can cause problems with this wall wash test. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">On the other hand, organic epoxy coatings tend to be quite smooth and the discolouration can be far more easily washed away. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoBodyTextIndent\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRVdBxkcs6I/AAAAAAAACTg/DOgBa-Rp0b8/s1600/P4270001+-+Copy.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRVdBxkcs6I/AAAAAAAACTg/DOgBa-Rp0b8/s1600/P4270001+-+Copy.JPG\" /></a></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ( 28 YEARS IN COMMAND )<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div>", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "4", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4093149015301266758/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "4373656899249148720", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2010-12-22T21:35:00+05:30", "updated": "2014-09-26T05:37:22+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDExNjkwMDQyNDU3Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/spirit-and-che-guevara-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4373656899249148720", "title": "SPIRIT AND CHE GUEVARA  --  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRIhaIlrg-I/AAAAAAAACOY/aZ3D2jftb5g/s1600/250px-GuerrilleroHeroico.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRIhaIlrg-I/AAAAAAAACOY/aZ3D2jftb5g/s320/250px-GuerrilleroHeroico.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"295\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nSPIRITUAL QUOTIENT-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">I really cannot do justice to the subject of SPIRIT unless I speak of CHE GUEVARA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Recently icons like Mike Tyson and Diego Maradona , who were no 1 in their respective fields , got the face of a human being , who died in 1967 tattooed on their bodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Tyson did it over his heart, Maradona on his biceps. Nobody in the word need to ask, whose is that face !.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRIiq6iXcDI/AAAAAAAACOc/R-yP12GONcI/s1600/che+%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRIiq6iXcDI/AAAAAAAACOc/R-yP12GONcI/s1600/che+%25281%2529.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"282\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKiNv-Za-I/AAAAAAAACOk/C_NBgNe3AyY/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKiNv-Za-I/AAAAAAAACOk/C_NBgNe3AyY/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" height=\"305\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKiC6D9dqI/AAAAAAAACOg/Tvd3jzh7y5E/s1600/download.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKiC6D9dqI/AAAAAAAACOg/Tvd3jzh7y5E/s1600/download.jpg\" height=\"200\" width=\"167\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Well we have billions of human beings who left their footprints on this planet. All of them had two eyes, one nose and a mouth. This face is special.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NkBgKLnS6sc/VCStLAwY3mI/AAAAAAAAwWE/nNnlV7DCdqk/s1600/imahrtkges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NkBgKLnS6sc/VCStLAwY3mI/AAAAAAAAwWE/nNnlV7DCdqk/s1600/imahrtkges.jpg\" height=\"155\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">What is so special about this face?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The face which stares at you is that of a handsome man wearing a Beret adorned with a star on it\u2026 with impatient haunting eyes burning with vision for the future of oppressed people through out the world .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZQYtBio3Vbc/VCStGO8E0WI/AAAAAAAAwV8/FCR1HYMwdFY/s1600/imahkges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZQYtBio3Vbc/VCStGO8E0WI/AAAAAAAAwV8/FCR1HYMwdFY/s1600/imahkges.jpg\" height=\"146\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The face has the ability to inspire hope and self emancipation and turn knaves into heroes. Maximum number of T shirts , patches , buttons and coffee cups on this planet have this enduring face emblazoned on it.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKi7iF69LI/AAAAAAAACOo/rsBzm2MB8_c/s1600/images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKi7iF69LI/AAAAAAAACOo/rsBzm2MB8_c/s1600/images.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">What is the reason?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">When the Castro brothers Fidel and Raul landed on the shores of Cuba from the boat Granma, they had just 17 men ill equipped and seasick alive with them \u2013 one of them was Che Guevara , an Argentinian doctor.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKjlYeDmnI/AAAAAAAACOs/K-ID9szSycg/s1600/images+%25283%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKjlYeDmnI/AAAAAAAACOs/K-ID9szSycg/s1600/images+%25283%2529.jpg\" height=\"221\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">They took on the might of the Yank backed puppet Batista government who had turned Cuba into a Las Vegas type whore house for the rich -- and won.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Che Guevera showed true character and took all the outrageous risks . He displayed outstanding individual prowess , authenticity and limitless faith, despite being a foreigner. He thus had supreme moral authority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The Castro brothers cornered the glory of the revolution for themselves. Later Che took the revolution to Congo and Bolivia, where he was finally done in by the Green berets.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKjo4CxsZI/AAAAAAAACOw/jlE-OYumNhw/s1600/images+%25282%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKjo4CxsZI/AAAAAAAACOw/jlE-OYumNhw/s1600/images+%25282%2529.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"385\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Now who is ze Green Beret?.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKj-SZbvkI/AAAAAAAACO0/ixu3mTme_ig/s1600/images+%25284%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKj-SZbvkI/AAAAAAAACO0/ixu3mTme_ig/s1600/images+%25284%2529.jpg\" height=\"232\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Rambo lisped from the corner of his mouth that he was one. The Green Berets were a group of 800 elite commandos created by Kennedy to smoke out Che Guevera from the wilderness of Boliva . Such was the fear he instilled on the oppressors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">At the age of 39, Che Guevara was captured in Bolivia and executed in Vallegrande, and his last words to his executor were, \"Shoot, coward, you're only going to kill a man\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKkC9xqLwI/AAAAAAAACO4/4ZDya-GGvfg/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKkC9xqLwI/AAAAAAAACO4/4ZDya-GGvfg/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"280\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">His hands were hacked off embalmed in Formaldehyde and sent to Castro and then buried in a unmarked grave as if his spirit would do more harm after he was dead than when he had been alive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Vows from the youth of those defiant times in the 60\u2019s resounded all across Latin America, \u201cNo lo vamos a olvidar! We won't let him be forgotten!!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-deTZCiW77Vo/VCStTwZk-HI/AAAAAAAAwWM/FI4CqUnXudg/s1600/imgrgrages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-deTZCiW77Vo/VCStTwZk-HI/AAAAAAAAwWM/FI4CqUnXudg/s1600/imgrgrages.jpg\" height=\"152\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Though Communism had driven itself into the ground and lost it\u2019s fire, Che Guevara still remains, as the ultimate SPIRIT behind every Revolution of the oppressed! The Legend of Che Guevara remains forever in the hearts of all rebels \u2013 be it a Tyson , a Maradona or a ordinary FREE SPIRITED biker.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKlUUVigfI/AAAAAAAACPA/fnkN0b9cKVc/s1600/images+%25285%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKlUUVigfI/AAAAAAAACPA/fnkN0b9cKVc/s1600/images+%25285%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The Naxalites of India, declared recently that they would run over India in other 40 years. Their leaders are narrow minded and selfish \u201c Psuedo Che Guavaras\u201d minus the spirit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Che Guevara is a larger than life man to measure up to, and impossible to surpass. But it must be granted that spirited men like him have an ability to inspire similar qualities in others.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-87PAh91CY2k/VCStYvojyrI/AAAAAAAAwWU/Nn7ar4SL_SQ/s1600/77789.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-87PAh91CY2k/VCStYvojyrI/AAAAAAAAwWU/Nn7ar4SL_SQ/s1600/77789.jpg\" height=\"316\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Che perished championing the cause of the oppressed world citizen\u2014he was not a bomber terrorist. Che exemplified sacrifice, tenacity and work ethic in the purest form and was ready to shed blood for all peoples.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">NOW LET ME GET BACK TO THE CORE SUBJECT \u2013 OF SPIRIT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Man has 3 faces to his nature \u2013 body, mind and spirit . A proper balance between the 3 is required. If any of the 3 is undeveloped he will suffer in life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKmeCI0vhI/AAAAAAAACPE/qXkTo2JPpX0/s1600/images+%25286%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKmeCI0vhI/AAAAAAAACPE/qXkTo2JPpX0/s1600/images+%25286%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">All distinctions between body mind and spirit are artificial. They have been created only to make it easier for us to comprehend our existence here on earth in linear time. We are holistic beings NOT a sum of our parts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKmh0ID99I/AAAAAAAACPI/AtWWKuwUBQI/s1600/images+%25287%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKmh0ID99I/AAAAAAAACPI/AtWWKuwUBQI/s1600/images+%25287%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Spiritually mature persons have an ability to be themselves. They are spontaneous and in the moment, capable of being anything the moment brings them. For them each moment is freshly minted \u2013 a source of delight and awe.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FAg_ymU533A/VCStfupmhRI/AAAAAAAAwWc/rJVDnIJ5NI8/s1600/alberto_korda__ernestohtr_che_guevara-337-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FAg_ymU533A/VCStfupmhRI/AAAAAAAAwWc/rJVDnIJ5NI8/s1600/alberto_korda__ernestohtr_che_guevara-337-1.jpg\" height=\"458\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">You experience timelessness, and defencelessness. These are qualities of spirit which are not constrained by control or fear. As we evolve, the spirit will control the mind and body to determine our thoughts, words and actions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aMV-OwCnijA/VCSs0An4JDI/AAAAAAAAwV0/UVZuxzoEjDw/s1600/Che-Guevara-Motthtrorcycle-Diaries-world-heritage-status-3-1024x678.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">At the apex of evolution, the mind takes its cues from the spirit and the body from the mind. 40 HZ neural Gamma oscillations that result in our human consciousness and our spiritual intelligence have their root in nothing less than 'God'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Spirit is the principle of conscious life-- the vital principle in humans, animating the body or mediating between body and soul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Leadership is of spirit.</b></span><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKp16pEHNI/AAAAAAAACPg/uRMSn12XCPo/s1600/images+%252816%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKp16pEHNI/AAAAAAAACPg/uRMSn12XCPo/s1600/images+%252816%2529.jpg\" height=\"286\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Spirit is active power or energy which invade people. Under its supernatural influence, people go beyond the apparently set limits of human knowledge, physical powers or endurance, like rivers exceeding its banks.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKnDAGPvdI/AAAAAAAACPM/jnbtWVrCTJU/s1600/images+%25289%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKnDAGPvdI/AAAAAAAACPM/jnbtWVrCTJU/s1600/images+%25289%2529.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Its practise is an ART. Leaders encourage the heart. Management is of the mind. Its practise is a science. You can be appointed a manager. But you are NOT a leader unless your appointment as a manager is ratified in the hearts and minds of those who work for you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Hope is oxygen for the human SPIRIT.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKnUsNvvrI/AAAAAAAACPQ/SoWfQuavb-8/s1600/images+%252811%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKnUsNvvrI/AAAAAAAACPQ/SoWfQuavb-8/s1600/images+%252811%2529.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Everything done in this world is achieved by hope. You breathe in hope by building up self confidence and pride in others. You remove your team from the black hole of despondency, growing apathy and despair. The most dangerous enemy within is indifference .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>A man should be guided by his SPIRIT.</b></span><span style=\"color: black; font-size: 11pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Spiritual Quotient is the latest buzzword. What are the benefits\u2014 the biggest is enduring courage and faith in moral values and conscience .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKoFlxejlI/AAAAAAAACPY/MbGGvdtLSF0/s1600/images+%252813%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKoFlxejlI/AAAAAAAACPY/MbGGvdtLSF0/s1600/images+%252813%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">The human spirit grows strong by conflict.</span><span class=\"apple-converted-space\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Storms make oaks take deeper root.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i>The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.- Martin Luther King</i></span><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<u1:p></u1:p>  <br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKnptbgfNI/AAAAAAAACPU/RrusCYeuscQ/s1600/images+%252812%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKnptbgfNI/AAAAAAAACPU/RrusCYeuscQ/s1600/images+%252812%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Here are the lyrics of a poem inspired by the overflowing spirit of world citizen, Che Guevara!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">\u201cFly Like An Eagle\" -- by The Steve Miller Band<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Feed the babies who don\u2019t have enough to eat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Shoe the Children with no shoes on their feet<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">House the people living in the Street<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Oh, there\u2019s a solution<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">I wanna\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Fly like an eagle, to the sea<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Fly like an eagle, let my SPIRIT carry me<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">I wanna \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">Fly like an eagle, till I'm free<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKoWLT6yRI/AAAAAAAACPc/iuLWL8hpKXo/s1600/images+%252815%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRKoWLT6yRI/AAAAAAAACPc/iuLWL8hpKXo/s1600/images+%252815%2529.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\">- --ride through the revolution--\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-q5vEycSPstM/VCStqCLDb6I/AAAAAAAAwWk/85ArmU70BMc/s1600/chehri3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-q5vEycSPstM/VCStqCLDb6I/AAAAAAAAwWk/85ArmU70BMc/s1600/chehri3.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"288\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /><object width=\"320\" height=\"266\" class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/z0vHvHmoioE/0.jpg\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/z0vHvHmoioE&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/z0vHvHmoioE&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRV4NSI8NPI/AAAAAAAACTk/R88_yYAG3rs/s1600/dark.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRV4NSI8NPI/AAAAAAAACTk/R88_yYAG3rs/s1600/dark.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><o:p><br />\n</o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><o:p>CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><o:p>..</o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "13", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4373656899249148720/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3460783459808293648", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2010-12-22T19:23:00+05:30", "updated": "2010-12-25T10:23:55+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMjkzMjUyODM1OTU4Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/managing-time-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3460783459808293648", "title": "MANAGING TIME --  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div class=\"MsoNormal\"><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"></div><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 14px;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRV42toJcfI/AAAAAAAACTo/ZV9NiE5SKuI/s1600/dark.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRV42toJcfI/AAAAAAAACTo/ZV9NiE5SKuI/s1600/dark.JPG\" /></a></div><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 14px;\"><br />\n</span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">This piece on TIME MANAGEMENT is for Masters of ships and top management ashore.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">As usual I am leaving it un edited and deliberately disjointed.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Yesterday I bumped into a long haired John Abraham look alike dude at the Forum mall in Bangalore . My 19 year old son had me in tow in his quest for World Cup endorsed Adidas football shoes. The dude sported a T shirt with \u201c so many gals \u201c in front and \u201c so little time\u201d on the rear. .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\"><a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPsOQ7hhtI/AAAAAAAABE4/0Drk0ipONDY/s1600/images+%252817%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\"><span style=\"color: blue; line-height: 115%; text-decoration: none;\"></span></a><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">I reached up and put a patronizing paw on his shoulder and drawled \u201c Son , you need to learn TIME MANAGEMENT \u201d . Pretty soon he was breathing down on me \u2014him , with his long haired mean look , sizing mE Sir Henry Morgan whiskers and obscene biceps.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPllcckDaI/AAAAAAAABDw/gmIhgxxQHH8/s1600/octopussy.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\"><span style=\"color: blue; line-height: 115%; text-decoration: none;\"></span></a><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Much to the relief of my pacifist son he decided in all his wisdom not to throw a punch and instead asked \u201c and how could I do that?\u201d .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">I offered instant wisdom \u201c Use the law of forced efficiency --- MANAGE TIME LATERALLY\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Now--The law of forced efficiency states that there is always enough time to do the most important things. Ok, you cant make time stand still or buy time or reverse time \u2014but you can at least make it run. Like how I used to make the Solankis and Tandels run at sea. It is no secret that Vadakayil got 12 months of work done on derailed Sichem Pearl in 4 months. I\u2019ll let out a huge chunk of the secret now itself . My walkie talkie was on all the time except when I slept\u2014no shipboard travel for conversing was allowed\u2014all official communications had to be on walkie talkie as a primary business tool\u2014conversations had to be to the point and crystal clear like masters orders to the quarter master on bridge while entering port with no scope for please, thank you or yaar shaar type fuzzy talk. In one swift move I heart punched the parasites and middlemen.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">The best way for a layman to get a hang of time management is the vision of Michael Schumacher roaring into the Formula One racing pits in his red Ferrari. After exactly 5.9 seconds he roars off. . Just stop reading for a while and relive the scene in your mann- mandir. Did you see focus? Did you see concentration? Could you see finger tip preparation? Did you see any pregnant turkey on the job putting his hands into motion without engaging his brain in gear?. Was the time frame known to all ? Did the team understand the law of sowing and reaping? Was there a honing of key skills? Did every thing count?\u2014did the team understand that everything they did either helped them or hurt them? \u2013was any action neutral? In short was TIME LEVERAGED by the central organizer cum leader ? Was there a bullshit clich\u00e9 30% work expansion rule in sight for the usual screw ups cushion? Was there fuzzy conversation?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Vadakayils law: Don\u2019t put your mouth or hands into motion before you put your brains into gear\u2014unless you are a reflex action trained Sukhov 30 MKI pilot engaged in a do or die dogfight with an F16. Action without thinking is the cause of every failure. \u2013and failure is the BIGGEST time waster.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\"><a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPsr1qdtqI/AAAAAAAABE8/5BySOm5927M/s1600/images+%252818%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\"><span style=\"color: blue; line-height: 115%; text-decoration: none;\"></span></a><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">I had written about \u201chumour quotient\u201d \u2013 in my vision for the next century. I wrote that no manager would be employed without HQ. Time has come for me to expound for lot of managers are bound to confuse frivolousness and Mr. Bean type buffoonery with HQ. HQ has got every thing to do with a phenomenon called LATERAL THINKING. This is all about using the right brain lobe more effectively. The human brain has 2 lobes\u2014left and right. The left side is used by all and sundry in short the VERTICAL THINKERS\u2013 the right lobe by very few who are capable of LATERAL THINKING.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPmXejocKI/AAAAAAAABD0/LmwdLF_rmPg/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\"><span style=\"color: blue; line-height: 115%; text-decoration: none;\"></span></a><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">The right lobe deals with humor, creativity , insight, music , color, surprise etc. Logic , reasoning and experience is handled by the left lobe. Humor does not appeal to the sense of logic\u2014only to the sense of interest. Humor management promotes flexible thinking. Humor encourages novel approaches and promotes innovation by making it legitimate to think in illogical ways. It is an expression of freedom of the human spirit. Humor provokes new patterns and generates new ideas. Humor breaks out of the concept prisons of old ideas.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">When I talk about a mental hop it is about securing a good connection with the right brain lobe. The Indian Yogis touch their thumb with the middle finger ( instant mudra ) to kick start this mode. Recently a guy by the name of Silva has lifted this millenniums old \u201cDIVING INTO THE SUBCONSCIOUS\u201d Indian yogic concept to ring in his own cash registers \u201c . By the way Viagra kick starts your other hop\u2014tee hee.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">What is this lateral thinking all about---<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Don\u2019t shut down your right lobe and your sub conscious and evaluate against experience using the left lobe \u2013for the conscious brain cannot multi task. A top manager who cannot multitask can never be a top notch performer.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Lateral thinking recognises that the approach to a problem is never as important as its solution. It cares two hoots for logical thinking which is the way computer software programs work. The tool of insight is a creative gift called lateral thinking. The good part is that lateral thinking can be learnt\u2014you need not be born with it. Brainstorming is one buzz term all are familiar with\u2014well this phenomenon is closely associated with lateral thinking\u2014I\u2019ll come back to this later ( avoiding time loss due to hasty decision induced firefighting ).<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Vertical thinking using the left lobe of the brain is all about being right and logical at EVERY sequential step\u2014it blocks all illogical pathways. Lateral thinking is more concerned with the wealth of thoughts . A vertical thinker and a lateral thinker had to go up a mountain with a large unwieldy piece of baggage. Guess what the lateral thinker did\u2014he went up the mountain without the load ( he took his thinking cap along ) looked down from the peak for the best way to bring the head load up\u2014and went down and brought it up . Well this was what the genius navigator Magellan did. He did not bluster his way through Magellan straits with his band playing \u201c kadam badhake aage chal\u201d on the forecastle \u2014he would take a small boat ,climb up a mountain and do some mental mapping from a vantage position before he took his ship through. Anybody who has been through Magellan straits will know what a tour-de- force his exploratory path was.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">A lateral thinker is never satisfied with the ADEQUATE beaten track. He does not drill his tunnel though logical steps to his goal\u2014rather he will leap frog\u2014opening new pathways. His last few steps is the one which will make his venture a success. Like building a bridge like the Sydney bridge. When the last part fits in at the centre\u2014and voila , the bridge suddenly becomes self supporting and is ready to take on the traffic.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">So then the mall attendant approached the vertical thinker and asked \u201c Sir, may I know what you are looking for\u201d and he will give a within the framework , usual , answer \u201c Oh, I am looking for this and some of that and more of that\u201d . Then he went to the lateral thinker and asked the same question . The provocative , unreasonable and outside the frame work answer was \u201c I\u2019ll let you know as soon as I see what I want\u201d .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">The much touted and admired EQ of this century is about being right at every step. The misunderstood and much maligned IQ+HQ with its tinge of madness is all about being right only at the end. Sometimes the genius will move to an untenable position to find a tenable solution.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPPmcK9bTTI/AAAAAAAABD4/ZfchSvlcBCM/s1600/images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\"><span style=\"color: blue; line-height: 115%; text-decoration: none;\"></span></a><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">No wonder till now most of the work of the Indian Mathematical genius Ramanujam who died at a young age , is still unsolved. The cracks where he leap frogged across deferring logic is still a mystery. He recognized the wisdom that the need to be right all the time completely shuts out creativity and progress.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Ever heard of making progress forward by moving backward? When this is what lateral thinking NASA did recently when sending a satellite to a far away planet. The satellite went the reverse way and catapulted around another planet to achieve the escape velocity . BRAINSTORMING is the principal tool for lateral thinking--- you can now recollect self brainstorming when I dived into the pool of mentoring to locate truths etched on rock.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">The crew on Sichem pearl or Fairchem colt/ North contender will remember the profligate brainstorming exercises we had on the bridge . Lateral thinking is an&nbsp;anti judgement&nbsp;device unlike logic which survives on \u201cNYET\u201d MANAGEMENT or rejection. Here you deliberately delay judgement to save time. What does brainstorming do? It starts a train of thoughts. A group of people not less than 5 or more than 20 give their random thoughts to the chairman. People speak when they want to speak .Every thing goes. Nobody shall ridicule or shoot down somebody else\u2019s thoughts . If anybody evaluates somebody&nbsp;else's&nbsp;thoughts\u2014the chairman is expected to overrule it or expunge it from the minutes unlike a debate . For evaluation kills spontaneity in this group contribution to exploration and novel approach. A train of stimulating and provoking thoughts are generated working outside the frame work of reason\u2014the concern is for change and not for proof or logic. This breaks out of the frame work of rigid patterns and cliche units which our mind is so apt to construct because of the way it handles itself. Judgement or the selective stage is deferred ( procrastinated )to the the next day with the important men of the same group.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; line-height: 115%;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;\">Let me give an example of a successful brainstorming session which I held when I was a young chief officer on a hectic product tanker by the name of Visveswaraya. The engineers had their own duty mess where they used to eat in their greasy boiler suits at odd hours. Well \u2013Mickey mouse made a house there. Actually it was a huge vicious looking and fearless bandicoot who would charge at you if you tried to corner him. The master had a mini- crisis as the engineers refused to eat there till they saw the dead body of Mickey. Now Mickey was too large to enter a rat trap and sort of immune to rat poison. For the brainstorming session I called the entire crew list of nearly 60 crew . All and sundry gave their suggestions. The second engineers steward ( who was plain loco ) also gave his two pennies worth which made every body burst into derisive laughter. Actually this man was a big liability\u2014but since he had a past track record of good service and a huge family for whom he was the sole bread winner, he was tolerated . Now what was his suggestion? He said--- take two buckets one red , one blue ( which made me wonder if the bandicoot had colour vision ) half fill the red one with soap water\u2014 in the blue one put a piece of salted dried fish.
