Yes!!) , something to hope for , someone who gives you unconditional love \u2013it could be a pet-- and a good imagination.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\">Change<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\">To grow you must adapt yourself to the NEW ORDER\u2014or you remain vulnerable and unhappy in the unfamiliar zone. No one can change the inevitable. Accepting this wisdom saves undue frustration and misery.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPP41pFaJWI/AAAAAAAABGk/j5nx6ZFuMGA/s1600/images+%252822%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; text-decoration: none;\"></span></a><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><div align=\"center\" class=\"separator\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TPP5DBJwAyI/AAAAAAAABGo/HQ5VlLENGmo/s1600/images+%252823%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%; text-decoration: none;\"></span></a><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\">Continuity gives us roots--change gives us branches allowing us to grow and &nbsp;reach new heights -&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\">We cannot change anything unless we accept it.- Carl Jung</span></i><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><u1:p></u1:p>  <br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div style=\"line-height: 115%; If the Oxygen content in the ullage space ia greater than 50ppm the parcel gets contaminated due to production of peroxides and carbonyls.</span></b></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></b></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">If the Nitrogen pad is no good the cost of removing oxygenates and water from the parcel will be on owners account. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>Use graphite rupture discs</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRD_GQYDAzI/AAAAAAAACNs/15GamnTgClE/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRD_GQYDAzI/AAAAAAAACNs/15GamnTgClE/s1600/images+%25281%2529.jpg\" /></a></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"TxBrp3\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Bottom wall wash is done for Hexene 1 if the previous cargo is incompatible.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"TxBrp3\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRD_JAY6gUI/AAAAAAAACNw/PwWjU84RNZI/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRD_JAY6gUI/AAAAAAAACNw/PwWjU84RNZI/s1600/images+%252810%2529.jpg\" /></a></div><div class=\"TxBrp3\" style=\"line-height: 115%; margin-left: 0in;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Properties:<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">CHRIS/ HEX<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Colourless liquid<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Mild pleasant odour<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Highly flammable<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Uses/ perfurmes , dies, resins, polymer modifier<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">USCG cargo group/ 30<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Marpol category/ Y<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">VP/ 200 mm hg at 20C<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">VD/ 2.9<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">SG at 20C/ 0.673<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">BP/ 63.5C<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">MP/ -139.8<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">FP/ -26C<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">AH/ NIL<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Water solubility/ Negligible<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Visc at 20C/ 1 mPas<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Vapor inhalation/ dizziness and difficulty in breathing<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">WWT/ depends on last cargo. Sasol wants 1 ppm chlorides and PTT to hold for 50 minutes. The tank must be to methanol standards a, clean and dry.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Normally loaded in stainless steel tanks as a shippers requirement. Consult list of acceptable prior cargoes as provided by shippers.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Sasol spec is &lt;50ppm oxygen content in ullage space. Ship must maintain gas check log and report to operator every day. All tank openings must be gas tight to prevent escape of nitrogen. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Before loading the PV valve is pressure tested to +1900 mm Aq and checked for pressure drop.at this time check all butterworth port gaskets and tank dome gaskets for leaks using a Ultraprobe. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Purge nitrogen till the dew point is -45C or oxygen content is&lt;50 ppm inside the tank dome prior loading.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">VCS is used. All tanks must be individual and not connected together .<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">First foot sample is taken at pump stack drain cock bt running the pump.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Tanks are filled to 98% to reduce the oxygen in ullage space.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">When blowing shore line throttle the manifold valve.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Directional Rupture discs must be installed on top of PV valve with +2000 mmAq on one end and -500 mm AQ on the other branch . This is done only on completion of loading and completion of nitrogen pad with nitrogen of 99.99% purity.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>Between the PV valve and the discs there must be a bleeder cock to release gas pressure at regular intervals. Keep always one set rupture discs as spare. Be careful while handling the discs as they are brittle.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Use silicon tubes after loading if the gaskets of the tank do not have double defence. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">During voyage maintain the nitrogen pressure of tank between 1000mm to 1500 mm AQ. When padding keep the outlet as far away from the inlet as possible to prevent short circuiting. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">The voyage nitrogen log must be carefully maintained. Record every 4 hours the pressures , oxygen content, and weather. The padding times and quantity consumed must be included in the log. <o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">STS operations and barge loadings are not allowed by Sasol.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Hexane 1 is not good cargo if the next cargo is wall wash as the UV test is affected. Use emulsifier and cold wash.<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Peroxides can<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>decompose violently and form a source of ignition.\u2014hence blanketed with N2<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</span></div><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRD-Mqke7kI/AAAAAAAACNk/trDCbgwqQ4c/s1600/capt+ajit+vadakayil.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRD-Mqke7kI/AAAAAAAACNk/trDCbgwqQ4c/s1600/capt+ajit+vadakayil.JPG\" /></a></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><br />\n</div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ( 28 YEARS IN COMMAND )<o:p></o:p></span></div><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 11.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "63", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8663012721546548934/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "2749011827487869575", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2010-12-21T23:48:00+05:30", "updated": "2018-08-02T08:52:05+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTMzMTgwMTI1NzAwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/super-typhoon-bart-perfect-storm-capt.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2749011827487869575", "title": "SUPER TYPHOON BART, THE PERFECT STORM --  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRDtpbC_JBI/AAAAAAAACNI/iTdiBnmmrIs/s1600/BART+.JPG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"562\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRDtpbC_JBI/AAAAAAAACNI/iTdiBnmmrIs/s640/BART+.JPG.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE PERFECT STORM</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRDtuTAgEKI/AAAAAAAACNM/t3UJlzsBjSk/s1600/BART2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"290\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRDtuTAgEKI/AAAAAAAACNM/t3UJlzsBjSk/s400/BART2.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRVRuUyslPI/AAAAAAAACTc/p3jJh4RW6YE/s1600/images+%25281%2529+%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"497\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRVRuUyslPI/AAAAAAAACTc/p3jJh4RW6YE/s640/images+%25281%2529+%25281%2529.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-left: 0.5in; text-indent: -0.5in;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">In the end of 2000 I went with my wife and two sons for the movie \u201c The perfect storm \u201c .</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-left: 0.5in; text-indent: -0.5in;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-left: 0.5in; text-indent: -0.5in;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">At the end just before the small trawler got engulfed by the massive wave the entire movie hall</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">including my two children let out a collective gasp.</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-left: 0.5in; text-indent: -0.5in;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">As we came out from the hall after the movie my elder son , 14 years old at that time, told my</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">wife \u201c Daddy was not impressed by the movie \u201c</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I heard my wife telling him quietly \u201c Last year daddy survived a category 5 &nbsp;storm , which is several times bigger \u201c. &nbsp;My wife has sailed with me for 9 years and she had been through many Category 1 hurricanes , cyclones &nbsp;and typhoons.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">On 19<sup>th</sup> Sept 1999 my ship was discharging diesel , jet fuel and gasoline at Okinawa islands for the US military base.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">She was a 13 year old 60000 DWT tanker, and we had just 20% cargo balance , when the port shut and all ships including the US base aircraft carriers, nuclear submarines and the rest sailed away east into the Pacific to keep maximum distance from the eye of the approaching storm, predicted to grow to a category 5 storm. &nbsp;<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red;\">(Hurricane Katrina was category 3 \u2013 a less powerful one.)</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"264\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TREGDrp3jYI/AAAAAAAACN4/aiqd9sYKqic/s400/download.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">We had 3 days before the storm passed Okinawa. &nbsp;Initially it appeared that the eye approaching at a direction of NE would pass east of the island , then it appeared that it would pass west . Nothing can be taken for granted for a typhoon, as unlike hurricanes and cyclones else where in the world , typhoons are fickle and can change direction in a unpredictable manner , even take loops.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I had the safety department of my company \u2013 about 12 old fogey masters from London eating my head and twisting my arm to sail off east into the pacific with the US navy.&nbsp; This company was the largest VLCC operator of the world in the seventies ( no names ).</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I made a quick risk assessment . My ship\u2019s tall mid ship mast was unsupported without wire stays . The single long derrick could plumb 10 metres outside the hull on both sides. </span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JBiep8uHwUc/VAhUni84rtI/AAAAAAAAveU/7yOnOHjg7gg/s1600/MountainofWt4water%C2%A9JoeTomissen.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"236\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JBiep8uHwUc/VAhUni84rtI/AAAAAAAAveU/7yOnOHjg7gg/s1600/MountainofWt4water%C2%A9JoeTomissen.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">In the past 13 years the ship had survived several category 1 storms\u2014but this one was special . There was NO time to weld eyes and rig up proper stays . If I sailed out with the existing draft and trim, my ship would slam , and have propeller over speed trips, and do hardly 2 knots with wind from right ahead and swell from beam (as per Buy Ballots law). The cargo tanks could not be ballasted.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I quickly called for a crew muster on the bridge. </span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I told my crew \u201c The worst storm ever to hit the pacific is coming and is just 2.5 days away. Company wants us to sail away like how the US fleet has done , but in my opinion our ship will get damaged very badly , the midship mast might fall down and we may sink. &nbsp;The other option is to use the Okinawa island as a typhoon shelter , where I will offer my ship to the wind , never to the waves . Liquid is NOT compressible while air is.&nbsp; The decision is yours,&nbsp; as now this extraordinary situation demands that you partake in this decision where your own lives are in danger\u201d</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The crew were too stunned for words.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Then I said \u201c I plan to stay right here at Okhinawa , which is a perfect natural typhoon shelter with the island as a W shape, with 500 metres high mountains \u2013 I must repeat that company has ordered me to sail away with the US fleet . &nbsp;I know what to do and I &nbsp;too have a family &nbsp;waiting for me at home. &nbsp;All those who trust my judgement and support my decision to stay here, raise your hands. I will monitor everything for the next 3 days personally . I promise you a safe and divine experience. I am competent and confident enough to deal with this situation &nbsp;\u201d</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">That was the quickest raise of hands I have ever seen in my life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The decision made and behind me , &nbsp;I made a call to the safety department captains in London.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<i><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The old captains &nbsp;, bedded down for retirement, &nbsp;were already pissed off with me because within 24 hours of taking over command I had sent them a message stating that all past oil record book entries treat port slop tank as the dirty slop and stbd slop as the clean slop ( closed cycle wash ) while it is actually opposite, &nbsp;as the position of the lower equalizing valve determines which is slop clean and which is dirty. And all of them has inspected the ship and done sailing audits over the past 13 years. &nbsp;It also proved that the ship and the company had flouted Marpol regulations over 13 years.</span></i></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<i><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></i></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The safety dept curtly and rudely ordered me to sail .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">To prevent lengthy arguments , I just told them to FO &nbsp;\u201c You are interested in property and insurance . I am interested in lives and cannot betray the trust of my crew.&nbsp; TA TA BYE BYE , shall talk again after the storm blows over in 3 days time\u2014 till then you shall leave me alone.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Then I took the ship to the right side of the W &nbsp;(see picture ) , assuming that the eye would pass west of Okinawa 35 miles off, and anytime the eye passed east of Okinawa then I would bring my ship to the left of the W in a jiffy . The island is just 60 miles long .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">As per Buy Ballots law the swell comes from the eye , but wind comes 90 degrees to the left in the northern hemisphere. Or conversely stop the ship and face the wind--the eye of the storm ( close by ) will be 90 degrees to your right in the northern hemisphere.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The crew rigged up a comfortable bed for me in the wheelhouse.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Every 30 minutes I would personally record the direction of wind and swell. &nbsp; This was to find out if the eye would pass to west of Okinawa or the east. &nbsp;This was the area where the eye would suddenly pick up speed or unpredictable change direction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">On 21<sup>st</sup> 0600 UTC the eye was 200 miles SW of Okinawa, approaching in a NE direction at 7 knots .</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">To cut a long story short\u2014Okinawa island US naval base has their meteorological station.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">They recorded the edge of the eye to have passed 34 miles west of the island</span> <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">with a strength of <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">262 kilometers / hour winds</span> and <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">barometric pressure of 898 HPa / Millibars</span> at 1200 UTC on 22<sup>nd</sup> Sept 1999.</span> </span>&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">This made super typhoon Bart <b>greater than category 5 </b>on the Saffir Simpson scale , and the strongest typhoon ever recorded in the Pacific.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"color: red;\"></span>The previous one was a category 5 typhoon Vera on Sept 26<sup>th</sup> &nbsp;1959 -- &nbsp;less powerful than Bart. &nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Vera had killed 5238 people. &nbsp;But Bart killed just 30 people but destroyed &nbsp;80000 homes in Japan and caused 4 billion USD in damages.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The night the 10 mile diameter storm eye passes the island to the west, I took my ship outside the right hand side of the W\u2014again to offer my ship only to the wind, never to the waves.&nbsp; </span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Every thing outside looked like milky foam. Our ear drums pained due to less atmospheric pressure. Rain was horizontal.&nbsp; The ship was getting a high pressure wash of compressed air and water. I could see tough epoxy paint getting stripped.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The anemometer bearings meant for 120 kms/hr winds max \u2013got overheated and disintegrated.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">My crew watched &nbsp;hit Bollywood movies though the storm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Once it was established that the hurricane eye would indeed past west of the Island, Chief officer came on bridge and offered to relieve me for a short cat nap.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I said &nbsp;\" No!, this would be in breach of my promise to the crew that i would personally take take care of everything \"</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">My Chief officer went down and slept through the storm &nbsp;.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Next day after the storm passed and was racing for Japan , I asked him&nbsp; \u201c Did you get a peaceful sleep?\u201d</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">He said \u201c Yes , that is because I trusted your judgement . Other wise I would have informed the London safety dept and deposed you!\u201d</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I said \u201c Son, did you get such inspiring thoughts from the Hollywood movie Crimson Tide ? Thank your stars that you did NOT give me the self inflicted black spot, wrest command from me the way submarine Chief Mate Denzel Washington did to Captain Gene Hackman. &nbsp;If you remember, there was a show of hands . Our crew trusted the experience and competence of a senior master\u2014 they would have just thrown you into the howling winds &nbsp;, if you had tried anything silly! \u201d</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Well, &nbsp;my Chief officers face turned white as a sheet .</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">When your life is in danger, normal rules, regulations and procedures don\u2019t apply.&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">When extraordinary situations develop, you require extra ordinary solutions. My solution was based on a 4000 year old Indian story from Panchatantra tales &nbsp;. It was about a fight between the mountain and the wind, where the mountain won. </span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Panchatantra was a series of stories based on the varied and exotic wild life in Indian Jungles, basically deep jungle wisdom. Every story has a moral.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">I just used the 500 metre high mountain range of Okinawa to beat the wind. &nbsp;I used nature to beat nature. </span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Digression: It is</span> </span>is a paradox--when things go beyond a limit you have to use the same medium to fight. &nbsp;When a oil rig catches fire -- fight fire with fire like Red Adiar\u2014water will not work. Create a second larger fire which will eat up the first fire, and then put off the second fire by remote control. &nbsp; &nbsp;When your crude oil tanks are too dirty with thick black sludge, you cant wash it with water--you have to do COW , (crude oil wash) with the same medium, and the tanks become amazingly clean. </span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">And when it crosses the Lakshman Rekha , or threshold, the opposite happens. When grief if too much you start to laugh.&nbsp; If the track is too slippery , mud bikers turn the handle the opposite way. When you travel faster and faster you go ahead in time, and when you cross the speed of light, you go back in time.</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TREGQ-avZTI/AAAAAAAACOA/Bg69CmYjXxs/s1600/images+%25284%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"283\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TREGQ-avZTI/AAAAAAAACOA/Bg69CmYjXxs/s400/images+%25284%2529.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></span></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRYYS0nBVSI/AAAAAAAACY4/ngEsJz888ag/s1600/hurricane+photo.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"500\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_tugjD0mUn6M/TRYYS0nBVSI/AAAAAAAACY4/ngEsJz888ag/s640/hurricane+photo.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></span></a></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-top: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Later we came to know that the US aircraft carrier , who sailed away 3 days in advance , had lost planes from the flight deck. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Such was the power and reach of Super Typhoon Bart.</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">What were the damages to my ship? Stripped epoxy paint all over due to the water blasting , a gaping hole where the anemometer fan was, &nbsp;fresh water in each and every external light shade-- that's all-- &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">-- &nbsp;since the London safety department old fogeys could NOT patronise me, it pissed them off even more.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KyR284NVRbQ/VAhUw5w-LuI/AAAAAAAAvec/3doAd_kna0Y/s1600/gw.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif;\">And what was the effect of super typhoon Bart on me? &nbsp;i am unfazed by everything in life-- for no force on earth can match the fury of what i encountered.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times&quot;;\"><em>To give readers an idea what a super typhoon is-- see video below.&nbsp; It is just a \"less than category ONE \" --&nbsp; windforce 11 , typhoon-- </em></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/LwKXfc_a4Ag/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/LwKXfc_a4Ag&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/LwKXfc_a4Ag&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-outline-level: 3;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-outline-level: 3;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-outline-level: 3;\">\n<b><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 13.5pt;\">THE SAFFIR-SIMPSON STORM CATEGORY SCALE<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">Storms are measured on the Saffir-Simpson scale depending on wind speed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n1 knot= 1.852 kilometers<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<b><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">Category One - 74-95mph<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">The main risk at this level is flooding, although winds can be strong enough to blow away unanchored mobile homes and uproot trees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<b><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Category Two - 96-110mph<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">Winds are strong enough to severely damage mobile homes and lift off roofs, as well as uproot vegetation. They can cause severe flooding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<b><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Category Three - 111-130mph<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">These are defined as major hurricanes, and can cause severe damage to homes and buildings, entirely wiping out trailer parks.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<b><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Category Four - 131-155mph<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">These can wipe out entire houses and cause extensive inland flooding.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">Category Five - 156+ mph</span></b><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto;\">\n<span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The 'king of hurricanes' damages everything in its wake, with only strong metal buildings more than three miles inland surviving unscathed</span>.&nbsp; <span style=\"color: blue;\">Ships rarely surive to tell the tale.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: black; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3153449960981984161\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;
